  Name: _______________________________&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p align="left"><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  Title:&nbsp;&nbsp; _______________________________&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p align="center"><font size="2">I-2</font></p>
  <hr noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">


  <p align="center"><font size="2"><b><u>EXHIBIT J</u></b></font></p>
  <p align="center"><b><u><font size="2">ASSIGNMENT AGREEMENT</font></u></b></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS ASSIGNMENT AGREEMENT,
  dated as of the date set forth at the top of <u>Attachment 1 </u> hereto, by
  and among:&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  (1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The bank designated under item A of
  <u>Attachment 1 </u> hereto as the Assignor Lender<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (&#147;<u>Assignor Lender</u>&#148;); and</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  (2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Each bank designated under item B of <u>Attachment
  1
  </u> hereto as an Assignee Lender (individually, an<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &#147;<u>Assignee Lender</u>&#148;).</font></p>
  <p align="center"><b><u><font size="2">RECITALS</font></u></b></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Assignor
  Lender is one of Lenders which is a party to the Credit Agreement dated as of
  August 9, 2000, by and among ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED (&#147;<u>Borrower</u>&#148;),
  Assignor Lender and the other financial institutions parties thereto
  (collectively, the &#147;<u>Lenders</u>&#148;) and ABN AMRO BANK N.V., as agent for
  Lenders (in such capacity, &#147;<u>Administrative Agent</u>&#148;). (Such credit
  agreement, as amended, supplemented or otherwise modified in accordance with
  its terms from time to time to be referred to herein as the &#147;<u>Credit
  Agreement</u>&#148;).</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Assignor
  Lender wishes to sell, and Assignee Lender wishes to purchase, all or a
  portion of Assignor Lender&#146;s rights under the Credit Agreement pursuant to <u>Subparagraph
  8.05(c) of the Credit Agreement</u>.</font></p>
  <p align="center"><b><u><font size="2">AGREEMENT</font></u></b></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Now, therefore, the parties hereto hereby
  agree as follows:</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Definitions</u>.
  Except as otherwise defined in this Assignment Agreement, all capitalized
  terms used herein and defined in the Credit Agreement have the respective
  meanings given to those terms in the Credit Agreement.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Sale
  and Assignment</u>. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Assignment
  Agreement, Assignor Lender hereby agrees to sell, assign and delegate, without
  recourse except to the extent of its representations and warranties expressly
  set forth herein, to each Assignee Lender and each Assignee Lender hereby
  agrees to purchase, accept and assume the rights, obligations and duties of a
  Lender under the Credit Agreement and the other Credit Documents having
  Commitments and Loans as set forth under the caption &#147;Commitments or Loans
  Transferred&#148; opposite such Assignee Lender&#146;s name on <u>Attachment 1 </u>hereto
  and corresponding Proportionate Shares. Such sale, assignment and delegation
  shall become effective on the date designated in <u>Attachment 1</u> hereto
  (the &#147;<u>Assignment Effective Date</u>&#148;), which date shall be, unless
  Administrative Agent shall otherwise consent, at least five (5) Business Days
  after the date following the date counterparts of this Assignment Agreement
  are delivered to Administrative Agent in accordance with <u>Paragraph 3</u>
  hereof.</font></p>
  <p align="center"><font size="2">J-1</font></p>
  <hr noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">


  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Assignment
  Effective Notice</u>. Upon (a) receipt by Administrative Agent of five (5)
  counterparts of this Assignment Agreement (to each of which is attached a
  fully completed <u>Attachment 1</u>), each of which has been executed by
  Assignor Lender and each Assignee Lender (and, to the extent required by <u>Subparagraph
  8.05(c) of the Credit Agreement</u>, by Borrower and Administrative Agent) and
  (b) payment to Administrative Agent of the registration and processing fee
  specified in <u>Subparagraph 8.05(f) of the Credit Agreement</u> by Assignor
  Lender, Administrative Agent will transmit to Borrower, Assignor Lender and
  each Assignee Lender an Assignment Effective Notice substantially in the form
  of <u>Attachment 2</u> hereto, fully completed (an &#147;<u>Assignment Effective
  Notice</u>&#148;).&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Assignment
  Effective Date</u>. At or before 12:00 noon (local time of Assignor Lender) on
  the Assignment Effective Date, each Assignee Lender shall pay to Assignor
  Lender, in immediately available or same day funds, an amount equal to the
  purchase price, as agreed between Assignor Lender and such Assignee Lender
  (the &#147;<u>Purchase Price</u>&#148;), for the Commitments, Loans and
  Proportionate Shares purchased by such Assignee Lender hereunder. Effective
  upon receipt by Assignor Lender of the Purchase Price payable by each Assignee
  Lender, the sale, assignment and delegation to such Assignee Lender of such
  Commitments, Loans and Proportionate Shares as described in <u>Paragraph 2 </u>
  hereof shall become effective.&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Payments
  After the Assignment Effective Date</u>. Assignor Lender and each Assignee
  Lender hereby agree that Administrative Agent shall, and hereby authorize and
  direct Administrative Agent to, allocate amounts payable under the Credit
  Agreement and the other Credit Documents as follows:&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; All principal payments made after the
  Assignment Effective Date with respect to each Commitment, Loan<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; and Proportionate Share assigned to an&nbsp;Assignee
  Lender pursuant to this Assignment Agreement shall be payable<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; to such Assignee
  Lender.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  (b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; All interest, fees and other amounts accrued
  after the Assignment Effective Date with respect to each&nbsp;<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Commitment, Loan and Proportionate Share assigned to
  an Assignee Lender pursuant to this Assignment<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agreement shall be payable to such Assignee Lender.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">Assignor Lender and each Assignee Lender shall make any
  separate arrangements between themselves which they deem appropriate with
  respect to payments between them of amounts paid under the Credit Documents on
  account of the Commitments, Loans and Proportionate Shares assigned to such
  Assignee Lender, and neither Administrative Agent nor Borrower shall have any
  responsibility to effect or carry out such separate arrangements.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Delivery
  of Notes</u>. On or prior to the Assignment Effective Date, Assignor Lender
  will deliver to Administrative Agent the Notes, if any, payable to Assignor
  Lender. On or prior to the Assignment Effective Date, Borrower will, if so
  requested by Assignee Lender(s) and Assignor Lenders, deliver to
  Administrative Agent new Notes for each Assignee Lender and Assignor Lender,
  in each case in principal amounts reflecting, in accordance with the Credit
  Agreement, their respective Commitments and Loans (as adjusted pursuant to
  this Assignment Agreement). Each such new Note shall be dated as provided in <u>Subparagraph
  8.05(c) of the</u></font></p>
  <p align="center"><font size="2">J-2</font></p>
  <hr noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">


  <p><font size="2"><u>Credit Agreement</u>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Promptly
  after the Assignment Effective Date, Administrative Agent will send to each of
  Assignor Lender and the Assignee Lenders its new Notes and will send to
  Borrower the superseded Notes payable to Assignor Lender, marked &#147;Replaced.&#148;&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Delivery of
  Copies of Credit Documents</u>. Concurrently with the execution and delivery
  hereof, Assignor Lender will provide to each Assignee Lender (if it is not
  already a Lender party to the Credit Agreement) conformed copies of all
  documents delivered to Assignor Lender on or prior to the Closing Date in
  satisfaction of the conditions precedent set forth in the Credit Agreement.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 8.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Further
  Assurances</u>. Each of the parties to this Assignment Agreement agrees that
  at any time and from time to time upon the written request of any other party,
  it will execute and deliver such further documents and do such further acts
  and things as such other party may reasonably request in order to effect the
  purposes of this Assignment Agreement.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 9.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Further
  Representations, Warranties and Covenants</u>. Assignor Lender and each
  Assignee Lender further represent and warrant to and covenant with each other,
  Administrative Agent and Lenders as follows:&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Other than the representation and warranty
  that it is the legal and beneficial owner of the interest being<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; assigned hereby free and clear of any adverse claim,
  Assignor Lender makes no representation or warranty and&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; assumes no responsibility with respect to any
  statements, warranties or representations made in or in connection<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; with the Credit Agreement or the other Credit
  Documents or the execution, legality, validity, enforceability,<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; genuineness, sufficiency or value of the Credit
  Agreement or the other Credit Documents furnished or the<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; collateral or any security interest therein.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  Assignor Lender makes no representation or warranty and assumes no
  responsibility with respect to the<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; financial condition of Borrower or any of its
  obligations under the Credit Agreement or any other Credit&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Documents.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  (c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Each Assignee Lender confirms that it has received
  a copy of the Credit Agreement and such other<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; documents and information as it has deemed
  appropriate to make its own credit analysis and decision to enter into<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; this Assignment Agreement.&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  Each Assignee Lender will, independently and without reliance upon
  Administrative Agent, Assignor<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Lender or any other Lender and based upon such
  documents and information as it shall deem appropriate at the<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; time, continue to make its own credit decisions
  in taking or not taking action under the Credit Agreement and the<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; other Credit Documents.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  (e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Each Assignee Lender appoints and authorizes
  Administrative Agent to take such action as<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Administrative Agent on its behalf and to
  exercise such powers under the Credit Agreement and the other Credit<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Documents as Administrative Agent is authorized
  to exercise by the terms thereof, together with such powers as<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; are reasonably incidental thereto, all in
  accordance with <u>Section VII of the Credit Agreement</u>.</font></p>
  <p align="center"><font size="2">J-3</font></p>
  <hr noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">


  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  Each Assignee Lender agrees that it will perform in accordance with their
  terms all of the obligations<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; which by the terms of the Credit Agreement and
  the other Credit Documents are required to be performed by it as<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; a Lender.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  (g)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Attachment 1</u> hereto sets forth
  administrative information with respect to each Assignee Lender.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 10.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Effect
  of this Assignment Agreement</u>. On and after the Assignment Effective Date,
  (a) each Assignee Lender shall be a Lender with Commitments and Loans equal to
  the Commitments and Loans set forth under the caption &#147;Commitments or Loans
  After Assignment&#148; opposite such Assignee Lender&#146;s name on <u>Attachment
  1 </u>
  hereto and corresponding Proportionate Shares and shall have the rights,
  duties and obligations of such a Lender under the Credit Agreement and the
  other Credit Documents and (b) Assignor Lender shall be a Lender with
  Commitments and Loans equal to the Commitments and Loans set forth under the
  caption &#147;Commitments or Loans After Assignment&#148; opposite Assignor Lender&#146;s
  name on <u>Attachment 1 </u> hereto and corresponding Proportionate Shares and
  shall have the rights, duties and obligations of such a Lender under the
  Credit Agreement and the other Credit Documents, or, if the Commitments and
  Loans of Assignor Lender have been reduced to $0, Assignor Lender shall cease
  to be a Lender and shall have no further obligation to make any Loans.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 11.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Miscellaneous</u>.
  This Assignment Agreement shall be governed by, and construed in accordance
  with, the laws of the State of California. Paragraph headings in this
  Assignment Agreement are for convenience of reference only and are not part of
  the substance hereof.</font></p>
  <p align="center"><font size="2">J-4</font></p>
  <hr noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">


  <p align="left"><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Assignment Agreement
  to be executed by their respective duly authorized officers as of the date set
  forth in <u>Attachment 1</u> hereto.</font></p>
  <font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

      <td align="left" width="119"><font size="2">&nbsp;</font></td>
      <td align="left" width="18"><font size="2">&nbsp;</font></td>

    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td align="center" width="197"><font size="2">______________</font></td>

  <p align="center"><u><font size="2">TO
  ASSIGNMENT AGREEMENT</font></u></p>
  <p align="center"><font size="2">&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p align="center"><font size="2">FORM
  OF</font></p>
  <p align="center"><u><font size="2">ASSIGNMENT
  EFFECTIVE NOTICE</font></u></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Reference is made
  to the Credit Agreement, dated as of August 9, 2000, among ADOBE SYSTEMS
  INCORPORATED (&#147;<u>Borrower</u>&#148;), the financial institutions parties
  thereto (the &#147;<u>Lenders</u>&#148;) and ABN AMRO BANK N.V., as agent for
  Lenders (in such capacity, &#147;<u>Administrative Agent</u>&#148;). Administrative
  Agent hereby acknowledges receipt of five executed counterparts of a completed
  Assignment Agreement, a copy of which is attached hereto. [Note: Attach copy
  of Assignment Agreement.] Terms defined in such Assignment Agreement are used
  herein as therein defined.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Pursuant to such Assignment Agreement, you are
  advised that the Assignment Effective Date will be __________.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Pursuant to such Assignment Agreement, Assignor
  Lender is required to deliver to Administrative Agent on or before the
  Assignment Effective Date the Note, if any, payable to Assignor Lender.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Pursuant to such Assignment Agreement, Borrower is
  required to deliver to Administrative Agent on or before the Assignment
  Effective Date the following Notes, each dated _________________ [Insert
  appropriate date]:&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  [Describe each new Note, if any, for Assignor Lender and each Assignee Lender
  as to principal amount.]&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Pursuant to such Assignment Agreement, each
  Assignee Lender is required to pay its Purchase Price to Assignor Lender at or
  before 12:00 Noon on the Assignment Effective Date in immediately available
  funds.</font></p>
  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

  <p><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.67
<SEQUENCE>5
<FILENAME>ex10-67.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 10.67
<TEXT>

<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "exhibit_10-67">

<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>exhibit_10-67</TITLE>

</HEAD>

<BODY bgcolor="#ffffff">


<P align="right"><b>Exhibit 10.67</b>
</P>
<P align="right">&nbsp;
</P>

<P align="center">
<B><U>AMENDMENT NO. 1 TO CREDIT AGREEMENT</U></B>
</P>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS AMENDMENT NO. 1 TO CREDIT AGREEMENT (this &#147;<u>Amendment</u>&#148;), dated as of August 9, 2000, is entered into by and among:
</P>
<blockquote>
  <blockquote>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED, a Delaware corporation (&#147;<u>Borrower</u>&#148;);
</P>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The financial institutions from time to time listed in
<u>Schedule I</u> to the Credit Agreement described below (such financial institutions to be referred to herein collectively as
&#147;<u>Lenders</u>&#148;); and
</P>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (3)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ABN AMRO BANK N.V., as agent for Lenders (in such capacity,
&#147;<u>Administrative Agent</u>&#148;).
</P>
  </blockquote>
</blockquote>
<P align="center">
<B><U>RECITALS</U></B>
</P>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Borrower, Lenders and Administrative Agent are parties to a Credit Agreement dated as of August 11, 1999 (the &#147;<u>Credit Agreement</u>&#148;) providing for a multi-year revolving credit facility and a 364-day revolving
credit facility convertible into term loans.
</P>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The 364-day revolving credit facility provided under the Credit Agreement has expired and Borrower has requested Lenders and Administrative Agent to amend the Credit Agreement to expand the definition of &#147;Permitted
Indebtedness&#148; to include a new revolving credit facility convertible into term loans being provided to Borrower by separate agreement.
</P>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
C.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Lenders and Administrative Agent are willing so to amend the Credit Agreement upon the terms and subject to the conditions set forth below.
</P>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the above recitals and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and adequacy of which are hereby acknowledged, Borrower, Lenders and Administrative Agent hereby agree as follows:
</P>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>1.</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <B><U>Definitions; Interpretation</U></B><B>. </B>All capitalized terms defined above and elsewhere in this Amendment shall be used herein as so defined. Unless otherwise defined herein, all other capitalized terms used
herein shall have the respective meanings given to those terms in the Credit Agreement, as amended by this Amendment. The rules of construction set forth in <U>Section I of the Credit Agreement</U> shall, to the extent not inconsistent with the terms of this Amendment, apply to this Amendment and are hereby incorporated by reference.
</P>
<P align="center">
1
</P>
<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=2>




<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>2.</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <B><U>Amendment to Credit Agreement</U></B><B>. </B>Subject to the satisfaction of the conditions set forth in <U>Paragraph
4 </U> below, <U>clause (x) of Subparagraph 5.02(a) of the Credit Agreement</U> is relettered <U>clause (xi)</U> and a new <U>clause (x)</U> is added to <U>Subparagraph 5.02(a)</U> as follows:
</P>
<blockquote>
  <blockquote>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &#147;(x)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Indebtedness of Borrower under a credit agreement, dated as of August 9, 2000, among Borrower, the financial institutions from time to time parties thereto as lenders, and ABN
AMRO as administrative agent for such lenders, providing for a revolving credit facility convertible into term loans in a maximum aggregate principal amount not to exceed $100,000,000, and any initial or successive refinancings of such Indebtedness
provided that (A) the principal amount of any such refinancing does not exceed $100,000,000 and (B) the material terms and provisions of such refinancing (including maturity, prepayment and default provisions) are no less favorable to Lenders than the
Indebtedness being refinanced; and&#148;
</P>
  </blockquote>
</blockquote>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>3.</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <B><U>Representations and Warranties</U></B><B>. </B>Borrower hereby represents and warrants to
Administrative Agent and Lenders that the following are true and correct on the date of this Amendment and, after giving effect to the amendment set forth in <U>Paragraph
2 </U> above, the following will be true and correct on the Effective Date (as defined below):
</P>
<blockquote>
  <blockquote>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The representations and warranties of Borrower set forth in <U>Paragraph 4.01 of the Credit Agreement</U> and in the other Credit Documents are true and correct in all material
respects as if made on such date (except for representations and warranties expressly made as of a specified date, which are true and correct as of such date); and
</P>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No Default has occurred and is continuing.
</P>
  </blockquote>
</blockquote>
<P>
(Without limiting the scope of the term &#147;Credit Documents,&#148; Borrower expressly acknowledges in making the representations and warranties set forth in this <U>Paragraph
3 </U> that, on and after the Effective Date hereof, such term includes this Amendment.)
</P>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>4.</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <B><U>Effective Date</U></B><B>.</B> The amendment effected by <U>Paragraph
2 </U> above shall become effective on August 9, 2000 (the &#147;<U>Effective Date</U>&#148;), subject to receipt by Administrative Agent on or prior to the Effective Date of the following, each in form and substance satisfactory to Administrative and
its respective counsel:
</P>
<blockquote>
  <blockquote>
<p>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Amendment duly executed by Borrower, Required Lenders and Administrative Agent; and</p>
    <p>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Such other evidence as Administrative Agent may reasonably request to establish the accuracy and
    completeness of the representations and warranties and compliance with the terms and conditions contained in this Amendment and the
    other Credit Documents.</p>
  </blockquote>
</blockquote>
<P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>5.</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <B><U>Effect of this Amendment</U></B><B>. </B>On and after the Effective Date, each reference in the Credit Agreement and the other Credit Documents to the Credit Agreement shall mean the Credit
</P>
<P align="center">
2
</P>
<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=2>




<P>
Agreement as amended hereby. Except as specifically amended above, (a) the Credit Agreement and the other Credit Documents shall remain in full force and effect and are hereby ratified and affirmed and (b) the execution, delivery and effectiveness of
this Amendment shall not, except as expressly provided herein, operate as a waiver of any right, power, or remedy of Lenders or Administrative Agent, nor constitute a waiver of any provision of the Credit Agreement or any other Credit Document.
</P>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>6.</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <B><U>Miscellaneous</U>.</B>
<blockquote>
  <blockquote>
    <p>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <U>Counterparts</U>. This Amendment may be executed in any number of identical counterparts, any set of
    which signed by all the parties hereto shall be deemed to constitute a complete, executed original for all
    purposes.</p>
<p>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <U>Headings</U>. Headings in this Amendment are for convenience of reference only and are not part of the substance hereof.</p>
    <p>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <U>Governing Law</U>. This Amendment shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California without reference to conflicts of law rules.</p>
  </blockquote>
</blockquote>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.68
<SEQUENCE>6
<FILENAME>ex10-68.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 10.68

<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "ex10-68">


<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>ex10-68</TITLE>
</HEAD>

<BODY bgcolor="#ffffff">


<A name="page_1"></A>

<P align="right">
<b><font size="2">Exhibit 10.68</font></b>
</P>

<P align="right">
&nbsp;
</P>

<P align="center">
<B><U><font size="2">AMENDMENT NO. 2 TO AMENDED, RESTATED AND CONSOLIDATED<br>
MASTER LEASE OF LAND AND IMPROVEMENTS</font></U></B>
</P>
<P>
    <font size="2">
    &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; THIS AMENDMENT NO. 2 TO AMENDED, RESTATED AND CONSOLIDATED MASTER LEASE OF LAND AND IMPROVEMENTS (this <U>&#147;Amendment</U>&#148;), dated as of August 9, 2000, is entered into by and between:&nbsp;</font>
</P>
<P>
    <font size="2">
    &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
    (1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED, a Delaware corporation (&#147;<u>Tenant</u>&#148;); and&nbsp;</font>
</P>
<P>
    <font size="2">
    &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
    (2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUMITOMO BANK LEASING AND FINANCE, INC., a Delaware corporation (&#147;<u>Landlord</u>&#148;).</font>
</P>
<P align="center">
<B><U><font size="2">RECITALS</font></U></B>
</P>
<P>
    <font size="2">
    &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Tenant and Landlord are parties to that certain Amended, Restated and
    Consolidated Master Lease of Land and Improvements, dated as of August 11, 1999, as amended by Amendment No. 1 dated as of October 8, 1999 (the &#147;<u>Lease</u>&#148;).</font>
</P>
<P>
    <font size="2">
    &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In connection with the Lease, Landlord entered into a Participation Agreement, dated as of August 11, 1999, with Tenant, certain financial institutions from time to time parties thereto (the &#147;<u>
Rent Purchasers</u>&#148;) and ABN AMRO Bank N.V., as agent for the Rent Purchasers (in such capacity, <U>&#147;Administrative Agent</U>&#148;), and a Rent Purchase Agreement, dated as of August 11, 1999, with the Rent Purchasers and Administrative Agent, pursuant to
which the Rent Purchasers purchased an interest in the Lease from Landlord.</font>
</P>
<P>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Tenant has requested that the indebtedness covenant in the Lease be amended and Landlord is willing so to amend the Lease upon the terms and subject to the conditions set forth in this Amendment.</font> 
<P align="center">
<B><U><font size="2">AGREEMENT</font></U></B>
</P>
<P>
    <font size="2">
    &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the above recitals and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and adequacy of which are hereby acknowledged, Tenant and Landlord hereby agree as follows:&nbsp;</font>
</P>
<P>
    <font size="2">
    &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;  	<B>1.</B> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <B><U>Definitions, Interpretation</U>.
    </B>All capitalized terms defined above and elsewhere in this Amendment shall be used herein as so defined. Unless otherwise defined herein, all other capitalized terms used herein shall have the respective meanings given to those terms <U>Appendix
    A </U> to the Lease. The rules of construction set forth in <U>Appendix </U>A to the Lease shall, to the extent not inconsistent with the terms of this Amendment, apply to this Amendment and are hereby incorporated by reference.</font>
</P>
<HR noshade size=2>


<p>
    <font size="2">
    &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <b>2.</b> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <B><U>Amendment to Lease</U>.
</B>Subject to the satisfaction of the conditions set forth in <U>Paragraph </U>4
below, the Lease is hereby amended as follows:</font></p>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>Clause (iii) of Section 7.1(b) of the Lease </U>is
amended and restated in its entirety as follows:</font>
    <p>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The
    initial and each subsequent Rental Period selected by Tenant for each
    Portion shall be one (1),<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; two (2), three (3), six (6), nine (9) or twelve
    months; <U>provided</U>, <U>however, </U>that (A) no Rental Period shall end<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; after
the Expiration Date; (B) no Rental Period shall be longer than one (1)
    month if a Default has occurred and<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; is
continuing at the time the Notice of
    Rental Period Selection is required to be delivered in accordance with<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; this&nbsp;
<U>Section 7.1(b)</U>; and (C) each Rental Period for which Tenant fails to make a selection by
    delivering a<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Notice of
Rental Period Selection in accordance with <U>Section 7.1(b) </U>shall
    be one (1) month.</font></p>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>Clause (x) of Section 21.21(a) of the Lease </U>is
relettered <U>clause (xi) </U>and a new <U>clause (x) </U>is added to<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>Section
21.21(a) </U>as follows:</font>
<p>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&#147;(x)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Indebtedness of Tenant under a credit agreement, dated as of August 9, 2000,
    among Tenant, the<br>
</font>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; financial institutions from time to time parties thereto
    as lenders, and ABN AMRO Bank N.V. as administrative&nbsp;<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; agent for such lenders,
    providing for a revolving credit facility convertible into term loans in a
    maximum&nbsp;<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; aggregate principal amount not to exceed $100,000,000, and any
    initial or successive refinancings of such&nbsp;<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Indebtedness provided that (A)
    the principal amount of any such refinancing does not exceed $100,000,000<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; and</font>
<font size="2"> </font><font size="2">(B) the material terms and provisions of such refinancing (including
    maturity, prepayment and default&nbsp;<br>
</font>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; provisions) are no less favorable to
    Landlord, the Rent Purchasers and Administrative Agent than the<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font>
<font size="2">Indebtedness
    being refinanced; and&#148;</font></p>

<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <U>Item 1 of Exhibit F to the Lease </U>is amended
and restated in its entirety as follows:</font>
<p>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font>
<font size="2">&#147;1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Credit Agreement, dated as of August 11, 1999, among Tenant, as Borrower, certain financial institutions<br>
</font><font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; from
time to time parties
      thereto, as Lenders, and ABN AMRO Bank N.V., as Administrative Agent,<br>
</font><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; providing </font><font size="2">credit facilities in the aggregate principal amount of $100,000,000&#148;</font></p>
<p>
    <font size="2">
    &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <b>3.</b> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <B><U></U></B><B><U>Representations
and Warranties</U>.
</B>Tenant hereby represents and warrants to Landlord, the Rent Purchasers and
Administrative Agent that the following are true and correct on the date of this
Amendment and that, after giving effect to the amendments set forth in <U>Paragraph </U>2
above, the following will be true and correct on the Effective Date (as defined
below):</font>   </p>
<P align="center">
<font size="2">
2</font>
</P>
<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=2>



<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
The representations and warranties of Tenant set
forth in <U>Section 21.18 </U>of the Lease and in the other Operative Documents
are true and correct in all material respects as if made on such date (except
for representations&nbsp; and warranties expressly made as of a specified date, which
shall be true as of such date); and</font>
<p>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
No Default has occurred and is continuing.</font>
</p>
<p><font size="2">
(Without limiting the scope of the term &#147;Operative Documents,&#148; Tenant
expressly acknowledges in making the representations and warranties set forth in
this <U>Paragraph </U>3 that, on and after the date hereof, such term includes
this Amendment.)</font></p>
<font size="2">
    &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <b>4.</b> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <B><U>Effective
Date</U>.
</B>The amendments effected by <U>Paragraph </U>2 above shall become effective
on August 9, 2000 (the &#147;<U>Effective Date</U>&#148;), subject to receipt by
Landlord and Administrative Agent on or prior to the Effective Date of the
following, each in form and substance satisfactory to Landlord and
Administrative Agent and their respective counsel:</font>
<p>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
The Consent to Amendment duly executed by Majority
Rent Purchasers;</font>
</p>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Amendment duly executed by Tenant and Landlord;
and</font>
<p>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Such other evidence as Landlord or Administrative
Agent may reasonably request to establish the accuracy and completeness in all
material respects of the representations and warranties and the compliance with
the terms and conditions contained in this Amendment and the other Operative
Documents.</font></p>
<p><font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <b>5.</b>  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <B><U>Effect of
this Amendment</U>.
</B>On and after the Effective Date, each reference in the Lease and the other
Operative Documents to the Lease shall mean the Lease as amended hereby. Except
as specifically amended above, (a) the Lease and the other Operative Documents
shall remain in full force and effect and are hereby ratified and affirmed and
(b) the execution, delivery and effectiveness of this Amendment shall not,
except as expressly provided herein, operate as a waiver of any right, power, or
remedy of Landlord, the Rent Purchasers or Administrative Agent, nor constitute
a waiver of any provision of the Lease or any other Operative Document.</font></p>
<p><font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <B>6.</B>  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <B><U>Miscellaneous</U>.</B></font></p>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>Counterparts</U>. This Amendment may be executed
in any number of identical counterparts, any set of which signed by all the
parties hereto shall be deemed to constitute a complete, executed original for
all purposes.</font>
<p>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <U>Headings</U>. Headings in this Amendment are for
convenience of reference only and are not part of the&nbsp; substance hereof.</font>
</p>
<font size="2">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>Governing Law</U>. This Amendment shall be
governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California
without reference to conflicts of law rules.</font>
<p align="center">
<font size="2">
[Signature pages follow]</font></p>
<p align="center">

    executed as of the day and year first above written.</font>
